item.title: Only Black: Minimist Black Chrome Theme
item.description: My first Chrome theme has been approved by the Google Store. Inspired by Tw93, the colors are modeled after Apple’s official documentation colors. Feel free to try it out: Link First submitted for review on: 2024-02-13. Approved and published on: 2024-02-14
